XII.ii.2.C.1.c
.
Preparing VA Form 21P-4180 for Referral to SSA
Follow the steps in the table below to refer
VA Form 21P-4180
to SSA.
Step
Action
1
Prepare
VA Form 21P-4180
, Part 1.
Reference
:  For more information on how to complete the items on
VA Form 21P-4180
, Part 1, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.1.d
.
2
Address and mail
VA Form 21P-4180
to the appropriate SSA Program Service Center (PSC), and
establish a 90-day suspense.
Reference
:  For more information on addressing and mailing
VA Form 21P-4180
, see
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.1.e
.
3
Has a reply been received from SSA before the end of the 90-day suspense period?
If
yes
,
take appropriate action as shown in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.2.d
.
If
no
,
send a follow-up by submitting another
VA Form 21P-4180
, which may be a reproduction of the claims folder copy, prominently marked
SECOND REQUEST
, and
maintain a 30-day suspense for response to the follow-up.
4
Has the reply been received from SSA before the end of the 30-day follow-up suspense period?
If
yes
, take appropriate action as shown in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.2.d
.
If
no
,
follow up by fax or telephone, and
maintain a 30-day suspense.
Note
:  Do
not
withhold the referral of
VA Form 21P-4180
to develop for any evidence that may be required to complete the claim.
